text:
Ruby is an amazing friend and a great trainer. Training with him not only works me out but also helps me understand my body even better. He not only trains you to suit your fitness goals but also teaches you how to maintain your results by providing logical explanations and truths. It's always fun and filled with laughter when working out with him. He makes exercising feel like a play day for me.

Thank you, Ruby!!

I can’t thank Ruby enough for the incredible support and guidance he provided during my injury recovery journey. Thanks to his expertise, personalized training plan, and constant motivation, I’m back to my regular running routine of 4–5 km, feeling stronger and more confident than ever.

Beyond being an exceptional trainer, he’s an excellent human being—always patient, understanding, and genuinely invested. His positive attitude and encouragement made a huge difference.

If you’re looking for someone who truly cares about your well-being and helps you achieve your fitness goals, I highly recommend Ruby.

Ruby is an exceptional fitness coach who stands out for his systematic approach, impeccable delegation, and unwavering commitment to helping her clients achieve their fitness goals. He takes the time to understand my needs and crafts customized plans that are both effective and sustainable. His ability to guide, motivate, and hold you accountable ensures steady progress. Ruby’s dedication and passion for fitness are truly inspiring, making him the perfect partner for anyone looking to transform their health and lifestyle. Highly recommended!!👍👍👍👍👍

Ruby designed and implemented a bespoke fitness and training program to help me in open water swimming, focusing on key areas (flexibility, strength, etc) in which I needed to improve. He would quickly adapt to what I needed to work on during a particular session -- whether in the gym or in the pool. Ruby's program helped me achieve a personal best in a recent 5 km swim. Not content, he is ramping up training for an even better result in my next events.

I don't know how to express my upmost gratitude to Ruby who willingly to share at all his best during my journey of fitness.

The hardest is to consistently kick-start your everyday routine. Once Ruby knew your determination, he made sure I did it right and continuously giving me the right advice when I'm lost in certain ways. And realign myself and move on.

From 83kg to 57kg. 9 mths. Thank you Ruby. Although we worked together virtually, your ways of motivation matters to me.

I managed to reverse back my prediabetic issue and now I'm still maintaining. Almost 5 years and I definately will continue on.

Thank you Ruby
